verbs.description: [ARGM-PRD: SALT LAKE CITY] -- [ARG0: Bishop Scott Hayashi of the Episcopal Diocese of Utah] [V: blasted] [ARG1: Attorney General Jeff Sessions and the Trump administration] [ARG2: for their justifications of separating migrant families at the border] .

SALT LAKE CITY -- Bishop Scott Hayashi of the Episcopal Diocese of Utah blasted Attorney General Jeff Sessions and the Trump administration for their justifications of [V: separating] [ARG1: migrant families] [ARGM-LOC: at the border] .
